name: Astrology and Horoscope Premium
detailed_description:
Astrology and Horoscope Premium is the most luxury astrology and horoscope application out there! It uses graphics acceleration to make the user interface smooth and rich with full HD graphics.

2018 Astrology Premium is the most luxury astrology horoscope educational app and numerology application for your computer. It uses graphics acceleration to make the user interface smooth and rich with full HD graphics (*when supported). Get daily predictions with biorhythms. Daily horoscope not included. We use professional astrologers and give you the best results. This App will replace your personal Astrologer with horoscopes and details about all zodiac signs: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces, Scorpio. Use the daily biorhythms.

Why use the old style astrology, matchmaking, numerology apps out there, when you can have the best looking one, personally designed on your needs, that actually uses your device's expensive hardware? Need horoscopes and astrology? Look no further.

✔ FREE YEARLY UPDATE.
✔ Native app with smooth and luxury UI that saves up to 3 users.
✔ Daily biorhythms predictions. Does not include daily horoscopes. Study yesterday, today & tomorrow.
✔ Yearly horoscope / zodiac. 2018 zodiac horoscope. Predict your relationship, sex, money and health. Birth chart not included.
✔ Astrology Compatibility - matchmaking! Check horoscopes compatibility. Is my boyfriend compatible with me? Check your love horoscope.
✔ Numerology explanation. My future. Use the numbers to unlock your fate.
✔ Astrology / horoscope Zodiac info. Do you know your planet? Your stone and color?
✔ Even more details like: Chinese sign, your tree and birth color.
✔ Designed for FHD computers with nice music.
✔ Multi language.

short_description: 2018 Astrology and Horoscope Premium is the most luxury astrology and horoscope application out there! It uses graphics acceleration to make the user interface smooth and rich with full HD graphics.
reviews:
“Astrology Premium brings the astrology - matchmaking - numerology apps to another level! Its luxurious design and the use of DirectX together with the endless info makes it one of the kind!”
5/5 – Phonesnews

“This is a gem for the people that know about astrology, and would want to improve their knowledge about it. It is also useful for the people that have no possible education about astrology, but are extremely interested to get to know about the concept on how it works, and how they can predict the future.”
5/5 – Softwarelint

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
